task.title: Batch Translating Slices
task.shortdesc: Translate multiple audio slices at once using AI.

prereq.p: You must have audio slices with transcriptions but missing translations.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Translation Manager page.
step.stepresult: The page displays a count of slices missing translations and a table listing them.

step.cmd: Review the list of pending items to confirm they are ready for translation.
step.info: Each row shows the original English text and a "Pending" status badge.

step.stepresult: The button shows a loading spinner while the AI processes the translations.

step.cmd: Wait for the batch translation to complete.
step.info: Processing time depends on the number of items. Each slice is translated individually by the AI.
step.stepresult: Successfully translated items are removed from the list. A success message appears in the console.

result.p: All processed slices now have Chinese translations and are ready for review in the Daily Review system. If all items were translated successfully, the page shows an empty state with a checkmark.

postreq.p: After batch translation, you may want to review individual translations for accuracy by editing them in the Audio Slicer or during Daily Review sessions.
